title: Honoring Kevin Gallagher upon the occasion of his retirement after 38 years of distinguished service
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION honoring Kevin Gallagher upon the occasion of his
retirement after 38 years of distinguished service

WHEREAS,  This  Legislative  Body seeks to acknowledge those individuals
whose professional lives and civic endeavors serve to enhance the  stat-
ure of the State of New York; and
  WHEREAS,  For  the  past  16 years, Kevin Gallagher rendered faithful,
conscientious and valuable service to Thrall Public Library District  of
Middletown and Wallkill; and
  WHEREAS,  Prior to that, Kevin Gallagher served in several capacities,
including Director at Adriance Memorial Library in  the  Greater  Pough-
keepsie  Library District, Assistant Director and Reference Librarian at
Adriance Memorial Library, and Librarian  at  Green  Haven  Correctional
Facility; and
  WHEREAS,  In  his  capacity  as  Executive  Director  at Thrall Public
Library District of Middletown and Wallkill, Kevin Gallagher served with
loyalty, honor and distinction; and
  WHEREAS, In his official acts, Kevin Gallagher was governed by a  keen
sense of duty and always showed a unique grasp of human problems; and
  WHEREAS,  Kevin  Gallagher  has  been affiliated with the Southeastern
Board, the American Library  Association/Public  Libraries  Association,
the  New  York  Library  Association and the Central Libraries Directors
Association; and
  WHEREAS, With him throughout have been  his  wife,  Donna,  and  their
children,  Erin,  Siobhan  and Sean, as well as their two grandchildren,
all of whom feel privileged to be a part of his life and rejoice in  his
achievements; and
  WHEREAS,  During  his  tenure  with  Thrall Public Library District of
Middletown and Wallkill, Kevin Gallagher earned the  admiration,  esteem
and affection of his colleagues; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
honor Kevin Gallagher upon the occasion of his retirement after 38 years
of distinguished service; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Kevin Gallagher.
